actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1500.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure failed of passage in House, roll call #664 (186-189).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on S. 1159, to authorize appropriations for the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives certain points of order against the conference report on S. 1159 (Motor Vehicle Acts funding).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on S. 1159, to authorize appropriations for the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act, and for other purposes.
